unnormalised: In the recent India vs. Australia cricket match on 20/10/2024, India scored 320/5 in 50 overs. Virat Kohli hit a century, scoring 110 runs off 120 balls. The Aussie team managed only 280 before getting all out in 48.2 overs, making India win by 40 runs.
normalised: In the recent India versus Australia cricket match on twentieth October two thousand and twenty four, India scored three hundred and twenty for five in fifty overs. Virat Kohli hit a century, scoring one hundred and ten runs off one hundred and twenty balls. The Aussie team managed only two hundred and eighty before getting all out in forty eight point two overs, making India win by forty runs.

unnormalised: Breaking down the stats, Rohit Sharma opened the innings with a score of 45, while KL Rahul contributed 62. In bowling, Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets, giving away 55 runs in his 10 overs spell. Ravi Ashwin secured 2 wickets for 48 runs.
normalised: Breaking down the stats, Rohit Sharma opened the innings with a score of forty five, while K-L Rahul contributed sixty two. In bowling, Jasprit Bumrah took three wickets, giving away fifty five runs in his ten overs spell. Ravi Ashwin secured two wickets for forty eight runs.

unnormalised: Historically, India has a win rate of approx. 65% against Australia in ODIs played on Indian soil. The highest individual score in ODIs remains 264 scored by Rohit Sharma. Fans are looking forward to the next match on 24/10/2024 at 2 PM IST.
